title: Phoenix, Vol. 3: Yamato/Space
description: This third volume of the series, following Phoenix: Dawn (Volume 1) and Phoenix: A Tale of the Future (Volume 2), features Tezuka's trademark alternating strains of Japan's feudal past (320-350 A.D.) and the world's far-flung future (2577 A.D.) in two tales that are both related and self-contained.
author: Osamu Tezuka
